Script: つけだれを用意していきたい
Meaning: I want to prepare the dipping sauce

Script: 荷物を預けるところはどこですか
Meaning: Where can I leave my luggage?

Script: このかばんを預かってもらえますか
Meaning: Can you keep this bag for me?

Script: 風邪で熱が３９度まであがった
Meaning: I have a cold and my fever has risen to 39 degrees

Script: かばんを棚に上げます
Meaning: I'll put my bag on the shelf

Script: 窓を開けてもいいですか
Meaning: Can I open the window?

Script: 寝坊したので朝ご飯を食べるのを諦めました
Meaning: I overslept, so I gave up eating breakfast

Script: 毎日同じ仕事をするのに飽きました
Meaning: I'm tired of doing the same job every day

Script: このぼたんを押すとドアがあきます
Meaning: Push this batten to open the door

Script: 去年その二つのチイムは優勝を争った
Meaning: Last year, those two teams fought for the championship

Script: 食事の前に手を洗いました
Meaning: I washed my hands before eating

Script: 森から熊が現れた
Meaning: A bear came out of the woods

Script: 突然物陰から男姿を現れした
Meaning: Suddenly, out of the shadows, a man appeared

Script: 郵便局は駅のそばにあります
Meaning: The post office is located near the station

Script: 銀座の街を歩きました
Meaning: Walked the streets of Ginza

Script: 週末友達と六本木で遊んだ
Meaning: I hang out with my friends in Roppongi over the weekend

Script: ボールが窓に当たってガラスが割れた
Meaning: The ball hit the window and broke the glass

Script: ダーツを的との中心位当てるのは難しい
Meaning: It's hard to hit a dart in the center of the target

Script: 切手がたくさん集まった
Meaning: I got a lot of stamps

Script: 私は切手を集めています
Meaning: I collect stamps

Script: 仕事の後で友達と会って食事に行きます
Meaning: I'm going to meet my friends for dinner after work

Script: 遅れたことを彼に謝った方がいい
Meaning: You should apologize to him for being late

Script: あなたの荷物を預かっています
Meaning: I keep your luggage

Script: 荷物を受付に預けました
Meaning: I left my luggage at the reception desk

Script: 肩がドアにぶつかりました
Meaning: My shoulder slammed into the door

Script: 足を机の角にぶつけてしまった
Meaning: I hit my foot on the corner of the desk

Script: あの人は日本人ですか。いいえ、違います
Meaning: Is that person Japanese? No, he's not.

Script: 椅子を机に近付けるください
Meaning: Move the chair closer to the desk

Script: 電車は駅に近づいた
Meaning: The train was approaching the station

Script: 子供は熊のぬいぐるみを抱いている
Meaning: The child is holding a stuffed bear

Script: その男はたくさんの人をだいました
Meaning: That man has killed a lot of people

Script: 給料が上がりました
Meaning: My salary has increased

Script: 友達の誕生日にプレンゼントをあげました
Meaning: I gave a friend a birthday present

Script: ドアに鍵がかかっていて、開けられません
Meaning: The door is locked and I can't open it

Script: この企画は見込みがない。あきらめよう
Meaning: This project has no chance. Let's give up.

Script: 息子はそのおもちゃにもう飽きたようだ
Meaning: I think my son has had enough of that toy

Script: 鍵が壊れていて窓が開かない
Meaning: The lock is broken and the window won't open

Script: 鈴木さんは佐藤さんと昇進を争っている
Meaning: Mr. Suzuki is competing with Mr. Sato for the promotion

Script: このセーターは洗えます
Meaning: This sweater can be washed

Script: 一時間待っても彼は現れなかった
Meaning: I waited for an hour, but he never showed

Script: 彼女は感情を態度に現しません
Meaning: She doesn't let her emotions show in her attitude

Script: 時間とお金があれば京都へ行きたいです
Meaning: If I had the time and money, I would go to Kyoto

Script: 三十分歩いてやっと駅に着いた
Meaning: After thirty minutes of walking, we finally arrived at the station

Script: 弟とゲムをして遊ぶつもりです
Meaning: I'm going to play some gam with my brother

Script: 天気予報が当たって午後から雪が降った
Meaning: The weather forecast was correct and it snowed in the afternoon

Script: クイズの答えを当てましょた
Meaning: Guess the answer to the quiz

Script: 明日は何時に集まればいいですか
Meaning: What time do you want us to meet tomorrow?

Script: 生徒達は全員校庭に集められた
Meaning: All the students were gathered in the schoolyard

Script: 明日三時に駅で会いましょう
Meaning: I'll meet you at the station tomorrow at 3:00

Script: 正直に謝ったら彼女は許して下さい
Meaning: If I apologize honestly, she'll forgive me

Script: このかばんを預かってもらえますか
Meaning: Can you keep this bag for me?

Script: 荷物を預けるところはどこですか
Meaning: Where can I leave my luggage?

Script: 彼女は車をガードレールぶつけました
Meaning: She hit the guardrail with her car

Script: 交差点で車とバイクがぶつかった
Meaning: A car and a motorcycle collided at an intersection

Script: この部屋とあの部屋は大きさが違います
Meaning: This room and that room are different in size

Script: 鈴木さんは仕事中人を近付けない
Meaning: Mr. Suzuki won't let anyone near him while he's working

Script: 危ないからその機会に近づいてはいけない
Meaning: It's dangerous, and you shouldn't approach that opportunity

Script: 彼は息子を両腕にしっかり抱いた
Meaning: He held his son tightly in both arm

Script: 彼らは観光客を騙して高いものを買わせた
Meaning: They tricked the tourists into buying expensive stuff

Script: スピーチおする時、いつもあがります
Meaning: I always get excited when I give a speech

Script: 質問があったら、手をあげてください
Meaning: Raise your hand if you have any questions

Script: 旅行に行くので、しばらく家を空けます
Meaning: I'm going on a trip, so I'll be away from home for a while

Script: あきらめてはいけません
Meaning: Don't give up

Script: 勉強に飽きたら散歩します
Meaning: When I get tired of studying, I'll take a walk

Script: 銀行は9時に開くそうです
Meaning: The bank opens at nine

Script: その土地が誰のものか法廷で争われた
Meaning: It was challenged in court as to who the land belonged to

Script: 彼女は子供たちにお皿を表せます
Meaning: She can show the dishes to the children

Script: 彼はいら立ちが声に表れていた
Meaning: His frustration was evident in his voice

Script: あの看板は何を現しているのでしょうか
Meaning: What does that sign show?

Script: 田中さんから電話がありました
Meaning: I just got a call from Mr. Tanaka

Script: ちょっと歩こうか
Meaning: Let's take a walk

Script: 遊んでばかりいないで、勉強しなさい
Meaning: Don't just play around. Study

Script: 宝くじで百万円が当たった
Meaning: I won one million yen in the lottery

Script: この箱の中は何か当ててみて下さい
Meaning: Guess what's in this box?

Script: 十時に集まって下さい
Meaning: Please meet me at ten o'clock.

Script: 論文を書くために資料を集めておきます
Meaning: I will collect materials to write my paper

Script: どこかでお会いしませんでしたか
Meaning: Have we met somewhere?

Script: 彼女はとても怒って彼に謝らせた
Meaning: She got very angry and made him apologize

Script: コートはどこで預かってくれますか
Meaning: Where can I keep my coat?

Script: あそこに預けられますよ
Meaning: You can leave it there

Script: 転んで頭を床にぶつけそうになった
Meaning: I fell down and almost hit my head on the floor

Script: この道は少し先で川とぶつかります
Meaning: This road meets the river a little further on

Script: 私は彼女と意見が違う
Meaning: I disagree with her

Script: 彼は顔を窓に近づけて外を見た
Meaning: He put his face close to the window and looked out

Script: クリスマスが近づくと街はにぎやかになる
Meaning: As Christmas approaches, the city becomes more and more lively

Script: 友達の赤ちゃんを抱かせてもらった
Meaning: I had my friend's baby hugged

Script: 彼はうそが上手ですっかり騙されてしまった
Meaning: He was such a good liar, he had me completely fooled

Script: 雨が上がったら、出かけましょうか
Meaning: Let's go out when the rain stops

Script: 日本語を教えてあげましょうか
Meaning: Shall I teach you Japanese?

Script: 今度の日曜日おけておいてください
Meaning: Please keep it for me this Sunday

Script: ゴールはもう少しだ。あきらめるな
Meaning: We're almost at the finish line. Don't give up

Script: すぐに飽きるのはあなたの悪いくせだ
Meaning: It's your bad habit to get bored easily

Script: その席は空いていますか
Meaning: Is that seat available?

Script: 争うのは好きじゃない
Meaning: I don't like to fight

Script: 何度洗ってもこのしみは落ちない
Meaning: No matter how many times I wash it, this stain won't come off

Script: 彼女は気持ちがすぐ顔に表れる
Meaning: She's so quick to let her feelings show on her face

Script: その景色の美しさは言葉で合わせない
Meaning: The beauty of the scenery cannot be matched by words

Script: 3時から会議あるので失礼します
Meaning: I have a meeting at 3:00. If you'll excuse me

Script: 駅から家まで歩いて五分ぐらいです
Meaning: It's about a five-minute walk from the station to my house

Script: 危険。この川で遊ぶな
Meaning: Dangerous. Don't play in this river
